author: Chao Hick Tin JA (delivering the judgment of the court):
casename: Ong Cheng Aik v Dayco Products Singapore Pte Ltd (in liquidation)
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Kan Ting Chiu J; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Francis Goh (Ari, Goh and Partners) for the appellant / applicant; Ashok Kumar, Eugene Thuraisingam and J Sathiaseelan (Allen and Gledhill) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Extension of time/Appellant timeously filing notice of appeal/Appellant's application for extension of time to file record of appeal dismissed by single judge Court of Appeal/Appellant appealing to full Court of Appeal/Whether court should grant extension of time/Applicable principles/Order 57 r 9(1) Rules of Court (Cap 322, R 5, 2004 Rev Ed)
